class.name: MinPriorityQueue
class.title: A min-priority queue class based on a pairing heap

description.p: This class provides the main functionalities of a prioritized queue, implemented using a pairing, min-heap.
It provides the same interface as SplPriorityQueue with the extra method, PriorityQueue::update which allows one to change the priority of a node in the queue.

constructor.title: Constructs a new empty queue
constructor.description: This constructs a new empty queue.
